name: JungleFall
description:
JungleFall is a pitfall tribute / homage made for the 2020 Epic MegaJam.  This game is a solo effort by our lead developer.

Built using Unreal Engine 4.26 with the latest tools available such as the new landmass and water plugins.

Controls:

Move Right: D on Keyboard or Right on Analog Stick

Move Left: A on Keyboard or Left on Analog Stick

Jump: spacebar on keyboard or gamepad bottom face button

Sprint: shift on keyboard or gamepad right face button

Known Bugs:

On very first play through lives do not show up correctly, after dying once it will appear as intended.

If you die on the first pit, the in-game cinematic loses character focus and does not look correct.  Restart game and jump over first pit without dying to see how it's supposed to look if this happens to you

On very last pit there is a destructible log that can be walk across but the material for the log is invisible until touched by the player.

Didn't have time to finalize a proper menu :(  Once submission are unlocked after judging a menu system will be added.
